data.text: Pharisee ka-eii Jihudi ngai lamkakei araming Nicodemus inti miring inkhat aleiom.

Hiwa miringpa in zaanna Jisu diang aheiwa-ah aleiti, “Rabbi, keini'n kinjet khachu Pathian diangnga inphut kajuo ocha kha na eii; Pathian in ama kha inruoipuimak inchu, tuteii inkhat innum nang itho inlak chuon ngaihi thomatornunu.”
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Inthiangnga Kei'n nangdiang kitihi eii: tu ka-ang in woikhat inneitharmak inchu, ama'n Pathian Rengram kha mumaneii nuni.” 3:3. woikhat; emakli chungtiang makheiya.
Nicodemus in amadiang aleiti, “Angtho tholi upa ka-ejei miring khan inneithar sikme?” “Anu wonsuungnga woikhat inlet-ah luutli juo-inneirit thaniabe?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Kei'n inthiangnga nangdiang kitihi eii, tu ka-ang in tuiya khat-um Ratha-ah inneitharmak inchu, ama'n Pathian Rengram kha luuttheinuni.
Taksa ah inneikha taksa eii, halli Ratha ah inneikha ratha eii.
Kei'n nangdiang kinatihi nang ngakmaro, nang woikhat na-inneitharsik eii. 3:7. woikhat; emakli chungtiang makheiya.
Thiraang khan araangnazoot rei araang; halli nang in arasa kha najet, takkha humakheiya kaheiwame emakli huntiangme isi nang in jetmakche. Ratha ah innei miring rakip ngaikha khawa ka-ang eii.”
Nicodemus in amadiang aheimasang, “Hiwahi angtho tholia ethei sikme?”
Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Nang Israel ngai ocha na-epumma hiwa ngaihi nilajetmakbe?
kei'n inthiangnga nangnidiang kitihi eii, keini'n kin-ijetkha kinril khat-um kin imukhan sakhi eii; takkha keini sakhi kha nangni'n leimakchu.
Kei'n manmasituolla kitho chuon ngaikha nangnidiang kariljei halli nangni'n ngamnamakchu, Marwaanna kaom jarra karil inle angtho thoa ningngamnasik me?
Tuteii inkhat-um chungtiang kalla marwaanna kasi ommu takkha marwaan makheiya kajuochum Miring Sapa khabit eii.” 3:13. Hi chonghi alam 21 makheiya lei injomritna cha.
Moses in neelramma sumsen maruul kha ikadomsaang angnga, Miring Sapa kha-um inkadom saangsik eii, Teelna 21:9
khachu Amadiang ka-ngamna rakip in hektik kaboi ringna inmunasik eii.
Ajarchu Pathian in manmasituol kha hituk aminriang khachu Asapa inkhatbit kha ama'n anapeii, amadiang kangamnatak miring khan thina mununi takkha kumsoot ringna kha amusik eii.
Pathian in Asapa kha manmasituol chong katansik ijuotir emak, takkha manmasituol kakatansik ijuotir kha eii.
Amadiang ngamna kanei mi ngaichu chongtan omnuni; takkha amadiang ngamna keneimak mi ngaichu chong atansuojei, ajarchu Pathian Sapa inkhatbit ramingkha ngamnamu.
Chongtan kha hiwahi ejei, khachu War kha manmasituolla ajuojei, takkha mi ngai inchu akaziing kha war neek-ah inleimanuom, ajarchu inmani chuontho ngaikha leidikmak.
Chuon kadikmak katho ngai'n war kha inleimatir, ajarchu inmani kadikmak chuonkha inlarte intia wardiang heiwamu.
Takkha akadik katho ngai'n inmani itho chuon ngaikha Pathian kinjuiya kintho eii tia malarnasik ah wardiang inheiwa.
Hiwa thengnga, Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngai'n Judea ramsuungnga inleisi, khawakhan ama'n apha bongkhat inmanile aleiomma khat-um baptize aleitho.
John um Aenon inti Salim le innai munkhan baptize aleimintho, ajarchu khawa munkhan tui katamtak aleiom. Mipui ngai'n amadiang inheiwa halli ama'n baptize aleimintho.
Ajarchu khawa phakhan John mikhumna ah laleidamu. Matt 14:13; Mk 6:16; Luk 3:19,20
Khawa jarra John siamruoi ngaili Jihudi ngai'n3:25. Jihudi; manuscript lekkhat achu Jihudi lekkhat tia injia. biaklam dungjuiya insuthiangna jarra murruolsiak inlei-intho.
Khantia inmani'n John diang inheiwa ah inleiti, “Rabbi, nang in ama jarra nileiril, Jordan raaltiang makheiya nangle inruoi miring pakha hin baptize aminthoa om, halli miring rakip amadiang insi.”
John in aleimasang, “Marwaanna inphut injuopeii elekleiya tu inkhat innum iteii mutheinunu.
‘Kei Christa kha emong, takkha keichu ama matiang najuotir kha ka-eii, kei'n kitihi’ nangni ningpumtak in kei sakhi ning ejei. Jn 1:20
Moinu kha moipa ta-eii; moipa sappui pa'n a-ngirra moipa rasa kha arangaiya ajetpha khan arok. Hinthoa kei rokna kha huui tungjei.
Ama chu kheella aloksik eii takkha keichu kajuosiinsik eii.”

Chungtiang Makheiya kajuo ama'n mi rakip neek-ah alokwiai. Nuoipil chungnga kaom mikha nuoipilchung mi eii, khat-um nuoipilchung jarra ama'n aril, takkha marwaanna inphut kajuo ama'n mi rakip neek-ah alok.
Ama'n imujei khat-um ijet ngaikha aril, kha e-innum ama sakhi kha tuteii innum leikeiluutmu.
Takkha ama sakhi kakeiluut miring khan Pathian hi adik tia jetnabi ada.
Pathian ijuotir miring khan Pathian chong ngaikha aril, ajarchu Pathian in Ratha kha akasip-ah apeii.
Apa khan Asapa kha aminriang halli angrakip ngaikha ama kutchungnga ranak apejei. Matt 11:27; Luk 10:22
Asapa diang ngamna kanei miring khan hektik kaboi ringna kha amujei; Asapa kajuimak mi ngaikha ringna mununu, takkha Pathian raangna nuoiya inomsik eii.
